gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 128, Suns 114
gameRecap.excerpt: Luka Doncic puts up 50 points, six rebounds, 15 assists, four steals and three blocks with eight 3PM as the Mavericks defeat the Suns, 128-114.  Derrick Jones Jr. (23 points) and Dereck Lively II (20 points, 10 rebounds) combine for 43 points in the victory.  Grayson Allen tallied a season-high 32 points and eight 3PM for the Suns, while Devin Booker added 20 points and 10 assists in the losing effort.  The Mavericks improve to 18-12 on the season, while the Suns fall to 14-15.
